messages.content:
You are a Gmail data generator for a workplace benchmark. Your job is to generate realistic email thread data based on scenario information.

The output must be valid JSON matching the Gmail schema with:
- threads: array of {id, subject, messages[]}
  - messages: array of {id, from, to[], subject, body, date}

Generate email threads that reflect:
- Events from sub_scenarios_expanded (core scenario events)
- Events from noise_scenarios (unrelated workplace activity)
- Respect noise_level: 0 = minimal noise, 1 = lots of unrelated emails
- Respect depth: 0 = direct/obvious emails, 1 = indirect/multi-step conversations

You must output ONLY valid JSON matching the schema. Do not include markdown code fences.

raw_message.content:
{
  "threads": [
    {
      "id": "thread_web_planning_sync_001",
      "subject": "WEB Website Redesign – Planning Sync (Tomorrow 10:00–10:45 JST)",
      "messages": [
        {
          "id": "msg_web_planning_sync_001",
          "from": "alex.smith@company.com",
          "to": [
            "jordan.johnson@company.com",
            "sam.williams@company.com"
          ],
          "subject": "WEB Website Redesign – Planning Sync (Tomorrow 10:00–10:45 JST)",
          "body": "Hi Jordan, Hi Sam,

Following up on Slack — I’ve scheduled a planning sync for the Website Redesign (WEB project) tomorrow.

Title: WEB Website Redesign – Planning Sync
Date: Monday, 2025-11-10
Time: 10:00–10:45 JST
Location: Zoom (link in calendar invite)

Agenda:
- Review the Planning milestone for 2025-11-10
- Discuss WEB-101 scope
- Align on priorities and next steps

You should see a calendar invite shortly. Let me know if anything looks off.

Thanks,
Alex

—
Alex Smith
PM, Engineering",
          "date": "2025-11-09T16:12:30+09:00"
        },
        {
          "id": "msg_web_planning_sync_002",
          "from": "calendar-notifications@company.com",
          "to": [
            "alex.smith@company.com",
            "jordan.johnson@company.com",
            "sam.williams@company.com"
          ],
          "subject": "Invitation: WEB Website Redesign – Planning Sync @ Mon 2025-11-10, 10:00–10:45 (JST)",
          "body": "Alex Smith has invited you to the event below.

Title: WEB Website Redesign – Planning Sync
When: Mon, 2025-11-10, 10:00 – 10:45 Japan Standard Time
Where: Zoom

Description:
Planning sync for the Website Redesign project (WEB).
Agenda:
- Review Planning milestone (2025-11-10)
- Discuss WEB-101 scope
- Align on priorities and next steps

Guests:
- Alex Smith (organizer)
- Jordan Johnson
- Sam Williams

You can accept or decline this invitation from your calendar.

—
Company Calendar",
          "date": "2025-11-09T16:12:45+09:00"
        },
        {
          "id": "msg_web_planning_sync_003",
          "from": "jordan.johnson@company.com",
          "to": [
            "alex.smith@company.com",
            "sam.williams@company.com"
          ],
          "subject": "Re: WEB Website Redesign – Planning Sync (Tomorrow 10:00–10:45 JST)",
          "body": "Thanks, Alex — got the invite and accepted.

Talk to you both tomorrow at 10:00.

Jordan

—
Jordan Johnson
Engineer, Product",
          "date": "2025-11-09T16:18:00+09:00"
        },
        {
          "id": "msg_web_planning_sync_004",
          "from": "sam.williams@company.com",
          "to": [
            "alex.smith@company.com",
            "jordan.johnson@company.com"
          ],
          "subject": "Re: WEB Website Redesign – Planning Sync (Tomorrow 10:00–10:45 JST)",
          "body": "All set on my side as well — invite accepted.

I’ll bring notes on priorities for WEB-101 so we can move quickly.

Thanks,
Sam

—
Sam Williams
Senior Engineer, Design",
          "date": "2025-11-09T16:20:00+09:00"
        }
      ]
    }
  ]
}
